name: Pimp.my.Gmail Misc
description:
Pimp.my.Gmail series!
If you prefer a script, check out : http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/75047

This style has some minor tweaks to complement the rest of the Pimp.my.Gmail series.
Features:
 + Font set to Segoe UI 8pt.
 + Hides the invite box.
 + Some cosmetics for the settings page.
 + Diff Gmail logo. [I use the NightShade theme, which is dark, so i decided to the logo from the Shiny theme, which suits it]

Find the rest of the Pimp.my.Gmail series @ "user 43074"
Also check out some of other Gmail scripts @ http://userscripts.org/users/76855/scripts
